name: FSourceEffectMidSideSpreaderSettings
doc:
FSourceEffectMidSideSpreaderSettings
This is the source effect's setting struct.

SpreadAmount: Amount of Mid/Side Spread. 0.0 is no spread, 1.0 is full wide.
InputMode: Indicate the channel mode of the input signal
OutputMode: Indicate the channel mode of the output signal
bEqualPower: Indicate whether an equal power relationship between the mid and side channels should be maintained
